医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
革命性的人工智能模型改善了痴呆症的早期诊断剑桥科学家开发了一种人工智能工具，能够在五分之四的情况下预测患有早期痴呆症的人是否会保持稳定或患上阿尔茨海默病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240713/Revolutionary-AI-model-improves-early-dementia-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240713/Revolutionary-AI-model-improves-early-dementia-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15b1ea9d-82b7-4a88-8293-4522744891a4 Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:43:00 -0400 Revolutionary AI model improves early dementia diagnosis
为圈养大象注射突破性 mRNA 疫苗以对抗 EEHV反灭绝公司 Colossal 宣布，其为第一头圈养大象提供研究支持和加速资金的 mRNA 疫苗已接种。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240713/Groundwriting-mRNA-vaccine-administered-to-captive-elephant-to-fight-EEHV.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240713/Groundwriting-mRNA-vaccine-administered-to-captive-elephant-to-fight-EEHV.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9229ffdf-446d-4ec8-bad0-0c4163278d3a Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:38:00 -0400 Groundbreaking mRNA vaccine administered to captive elephant to fight EEHV
创新AI糖尿病训练模块获国家认可诺森比亚大学的一位研究人员和她的团队开发了一种新的人工智能工具，为护理糖尿病患者的卫生专业人员提供支持，并获得了全国认可。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240713/Innovative-AI-diabetes-training-module-gets-national-recognition.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240713/Innovative-AI-diabetes-training-module-gets-national-recognition.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b62cf44-4d58-4ba5-8996-74cab20cc9e1 Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:33:00 -0400 Innovative AI diabetes training module gets national recognition
Mainz Biomed 寻求 FDA 先进结直肠癌测试突破性设备指定专门从事癌症早期检测的分子遗传学诊断公司 Mainz Biomed NV 宣布，已向美国食品和药物管理局 (FDA) 提交申请，要求其非侵入性下一代结直肠癌 (CRC) 获得突破性器械认定产品包括该公司的新型 mRNA 生物标志物组合。经 FDA 审查后，突破性器械认定可以显着加快审批速度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240713/Mainz-Biomed-seeks-FDAe28099s-Breakthrough-Devices-Designation-for-advanced-colorectal-cancer-test.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240713/Mainz-Biomed-seeks-FDAe28099s-Breakthrough-Devices-Designation-for-advanced-colorectal-cancer-test.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=98cce808-4cb8-4e1f-9723-501f7643c83e Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:27:00 -0400 Mainz Biomed seeks FDA’s Breakthrough Devices Designation for advanced colorectal cancer test
NICE 推荐 NHS 特应性皮炎患者使用 Almirall 的 Ebglyss Almirall SA 是一家致力于医学皮肤病学的全球生物制药公司，今天宣布，英国国家健康与护理卓越研究所 (NICE) 推荐 Ebglyss (lebrikizumab) 在英国 NHS 中用于治疗中度至重度特应性皮炎。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240713/Almiralls-Ebglyss-recommended-by-NICE-for-NHS-atopic-dermatitis-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240713/Almiralls-Ebglyss-recommished-by-NICE-for-NHS-atopic-dermatitis-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1bdfb9be-f106-4cc9-91cb-d50040bfe253 Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:21:00 -0400 Almirall's Ebglyss recommended by NICE for NHS atopic dermatitis patients
CXCL13浓度的新阈值彻底改变了神经疏螺旋体病的诊断新定义的细胞因子 CXCL13 浓度阈值可能会改善神经疏螺旋体病的诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240713/New-threshold-for-CXCL13-concentration-revolutionizes-neuroborreliosis-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240713/New-threshold-for-CXCL13-concentration-revolutionizes-neuroborreliosis-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7370c34f-2ddc-4257-b7b6-8348fca68546 Sat, 13 Jul 2024 00:14:00 -0400 New threshold for CXCL13 concentration revolutionizes neuroborreliosis diagnosis
简单的措施有助于解决老年人护理中的营养不良问题住院和其他医疗机构的所有患者中多达一半营养不良。这会给个人带来不必要的痛苦、生活质量下降和死亡率下降等严重后果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Simple-measures-can-help-address-malnutrition-in-elderly-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Simple-measures-can-help-address-malnutrition-in-elderly-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ed5181b0-ffd2-4562-b8ea-a0f2283cb34f Fri, 12 Jul 2024 23:28:45 -0400 Simple measures can help address malnutrition in elderly care
选择用于 2024 年巴黎奥运会和残奥会期间废水监测的优先病原体法国国家公共卫生研究所的研究人员进行的这项研究旨在确定适合于分别于 7 月 26 日至 8 月 11 日和 8 月 28 日至 9 月 8 日举行的 2024 年巴黎奥运会和残奥会期间进行废水监测 (WWS) 的优先病原体。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Priority-pathogens-selected-for-wastewater-surveillance-during-Paris-2024-Olympic-and-Paralympic-Games.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Priority-pathogens-selected-for-wastewater-surveillance-during-Paris-2024-Olympic-and-Paralympic-Games.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d8fdff4f-5a04-49f3-bf78-5110368ff9db Fri, 12 Jul 2024 23:21:08 -0400 Priority pathogens selected for wastewater surveillance during Paris 2024 Olympic and Paralympic Games
针对儿童和青少年的技术辅助治疗与传统的面对面治疗一样有效最新研究表明，利用技术为儿童和青少年提供治疗与传统的面对面治疗一样有效。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Technology-auxiliary-therapy-for-kids-and-young-people-is-as- effective-as-traditional-face-to-face-therapy。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Technology-auxiliary-therapy-for-kids-and-young-people-is-as- effective-as-traditional-face-to-face-therapy。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e1868844-d57a-4fd6-bb38-61d4c647e584 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 23:11:00 -0400 Technology-assisted therapy for kids and young people is as effective as traditional face-to-face therapy
研究人员确定了根据情境需求调整听力的大脑区域您是否注意到，当您集中注意力时，您会突然听到冰箱在背景中嗡嗡作响？或者即使在喧闹的人群中，你的名字如何立即引起你的注意？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Researchers-identify-brain-region-that-tunes-hearing-to-contextual-needs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240712/Researchers-identify-brain-region-that-tunes-hearing-to-contextual-needs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=502918cf-f2e4-4b1d-a107-33ff70600828 Fri, 12 Jul 2024 23:08:18 -0400 Researchers identify brain region that tunes hearing to contextual needs
